attributes.action: Halt the enforced contract change for junior doctors.
attributes.background: The government's unilateral contract changes for junior doctors look likely to dramatically cut wages, increase acceptable working hours, remove safeguards against overworking doctors and further damage morale in the profession.

rejection.details:
I'm sorry - we cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/108782

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
